review: Dr haripriya is a thorough professional who insisted on seeing my aged mother-in-law in person once before any medical recommendations. Her recommendations were highly effective in reducing post prandial from 400+ to around 140 in a week's time. She also apologised to me for the delay in meeting at clinic ( which speaks volumes of her sensitivity to time). Would highly recommend her for her poise, politeness and understanding of patients need. ðŸ‘Œ
